name: Descente à ski
description:
This is a school project I'm currently working on. I *might* keep working on it after I turn it in.

Controls:

  • Turning: Q-D / Left-Right arrows / Left stick
  • Increase speed: Z / Up arrow
  • Acceleration impulse: tap Z / Up arrow (the animation is missing)
  • Braking: S / Down arrow / Left stick down
  • Restart: Escape / Gamepad B

(Sorry about ZQSD, the game is only developed for AZERTY atm, in the meantime you can use the arrow keys or a controller)

The music might be a little loud, I recommend lowering its volume.

Scoring is unfinished, don't worry about it.

Impact detection is unfinished too, so you won't fall from hitting stuff.

I didn't test the Windows build, apparently it has a minor shader bug.
